          <title>
            <string language="en">How acid rain is produced and its harmful effects on the environment</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie saurer Regen und seine schädlichen Effekte 
auf die Umgebung produziert wird</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment des pluies acides sont produites et ses 
effets nocifs sur l'environnement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como a chuva ácida é produzida e seus efeitos 
prejudiciais no ambiente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come la pioggia acida è prodotta ed i relativi 
effetti nocivi sull'ambiente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς η όξινη βροχή παράγεται και τα επιβλαβή 
αποτελέσματά της στο περιβάλλον</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cómo se produce la lluvia ácida y sus efectos 
dañosos sobre el ambiente</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how waste gases produce acid rain. Its harmful effects on the environment are also indicated.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">animals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">plants</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">acidic lakes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">acidic rivers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">air</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">environment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">killing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nitrogen oxides</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sulphur dioxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">trees</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">waste gases</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie Abgase sauren Regen 
produzieren. Seine schädlichen Effekte auf die Umgebung werden 
auch angezeigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment les gaz de 
rebut produisent les pluies acides. Ses effets nocifs sur 
l'environnement sont également indiqués.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como os gáses waste 
produzem a chuva ácida. Seus efeitos prejudiciais no ambiente 
são indicados também.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come i gas di scarico
producono la pioggia acida. I relativi effetti nocivi 
sull'ambiente egualmente sono indicati.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς τα αέρια αποβλήτων
παράγουν την όξινη βροχή. Τα επιβλαβή αποτελέσματά του στο
περιβάλλον είναι επίσης υποδειγμένα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo los gases 
inútiles producen la lluvia ácida. Sus efectos dañosos sobre 
el ambiente también se indican.</string>
          </description>
